task.title: Installing the in Oxygen using the setup.exe [Windows only]

context.p: These instructions refer to (version 20 and above).

step.cmd: Navigate to the built-in DITA-OT folder located in (for example) [oxygen_install_dir]/frameworks/dita/DITA-OT3.x.

info.p: This folder corresponds to the oXygen DITA Open Toolkit 'Built-in DITA-OT 3.x' location preference shown here ( Options Preferences DITA ):

If you choose a different folder you will have to set the dita.dir variable in the MiramoPDF transformation scenarios before publishing, or change the oXygen DITA-OT configured install folder in the preferences.

stepresult.p: The MiramoDITA-OT plugin (including samples, command scripts and templates) is installed in the plugins directory of the DITA OT you selected. It is in a folder named com.miramo.mmpdf. For example:
The installer will run the DITA-OT integrator and will append the com.miramo.mmpdf folder to the PATH environment variable.

result.p: The plugin is now ready to use - it may be necessary to restart your DITA editing tool or CCMS output generator to ensure the new PATH takes effect.
